segment_text: She never looked away from the monitors, her fingers crawling like pale spiders over the keyboard.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: In the cramped room below, four faceless chrome steel robots writhed in spastic tai-chi.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: Each movement was a subroutine, read from an FM signal generated by Poly's program.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: "Beauty," said Sy, who was running the master VTR.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: Poly's hand moved to the ten-key, zooming in an overhead, and the monitor flashed stiff chrome nipples, erect steel penises, just visible under the orange quilted frocks.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: She cut to slo-mo for a final, blurred sweep across the bodies.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: "Hot," Sy said. "Really hot, babe."
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: The program scrolled off the screen. She let her hands fall into her lap.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: Not so hot, she thought. Strictly art imitates art.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: But good enough for CableVogue. What she'd wanted was to get the feel of the robot dancers that were suddenly everywhere on cable.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: In the two years the robots had been commercially available nobody had found much to do with them; they didn't have enough dexterity to work an assembly line and they were slaves to their programming.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: Poly had done a couple of static layouts with them for CableVogue, but other than that they had ended up collecting garbage and handling nuclear waste.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: Then the first dancer tape had shown up on an access channel.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: Nobody knew how long it had been happening, the robots spinning and posing in their own twisted, cybernetic art form, but once it caught on the cable was full of it.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: The style was more complex than it looked. Poly had approximated the timing with a random number generator, but she knew she didn't have the essence of it.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: The failure left her irritable and a little depressed. Just the perfect mood, she thought, to go see Helen.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: She dropped down the ladder to the living room of the converted studio flat.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: Sy was working his way through the robots, collecting the one-of-a-kind, stapled-together designer originals and putting them on hangers.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: The robots, disconnected from the transmission, slipped into a maintenance mode that was part of their firmware.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: A thin film of oil seeped out of their joints and then disappeared as they stretched slightly, slumped forward, and went dead.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: "Good shit," Sy said to her.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: She nodded and pulled heavy drapes off the window. The inside of the paperweight Helen had given her last year was moving slowly in the last rays of the sun.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: It was a glass dome with two perpendicular foil sails inside, held in a vacuum.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: The fronts of the sails were silver and the backs were black and it was so perfectly balanced that the pressure of the sunlight alone could make the sails spin.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: "What now?" Sy said.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: She looked at the robots. "Get them out of here."
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: "Okay." She took her jacket off the hook behind the door.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: "Hospital?" Sy asked. She nodded again.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: "Any...?" Word? she thought.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: Improvement? Hope? "No," she said.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: She dozed off in the cab.
scene_description: indoors, car interior, blurred city lights, nighttime.

segment_text: It was sleep as defense, the kind of sleep that comes after early alarms and before appointments with abusive clients.
scene_description: indoors, car interior, blurred city lights, nighttime.

segment_text: She woke up at the hospital and wandered groggily into an elevator.
scene_description: indoors, hospital elevator, sterile corridors, fluorescent lighting.

segment_text: Why do I keep coming? she asked herself. Helen doesn't even expect it any more.
scene_description: indoors, hospital elevator, sterile corridors, fluorescent lighting.

segment_text: Is it just that if it hadn't been for the cancer we would probably have broken up? That I got pressured into something that's pretending to be love because she's going to die?
scene_description: indoors, hospital elevator, sterile corridors, fluorescent lighting.

segment_text: The elevator chimed her floor. She stumbled getting off and nearly fell.
scene_description: indoors, hospital elevator, sterile corridors, fluorescent lighting.

segment_text: Even my own feet are trying to keep me away, she thought.
scene_description: indoors, hospital elevator, sterile corridors, fluorescent lighting.

segment_text: The overhead lights were on in Helen's room. Poly stuck her head through the doorway, saw a doctor on either side of the bed.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: They had Helen's gown up so they could look at the growth. When they noticed Poly they nodded vaguely at her and kept talking.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: The medical name for it was Type II Teratocarcinoma. Superficially it resembled malignant teratoma, a fairly rare cancer that attacked germ cells in the ovary and testes.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: Teratomas produced specialized tissues--skin, hair, sometimes even teeth. But teratoma was just cancer, and most cancer was under control these days, between radiation and chemo and beta carotene.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: The new tumors didn't respond to any standard techniques. When the pathologists autopsied them they found something they'd never seen before.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: The new virus, and they were pretty sure it was a virus, was even more specialized than teratoma. Sometimes it built kidney cells, sometimes liver cells.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: One built a nearly functional, hormone-secreting ovary inside a patient's scrotum. But most of all it liked to make brain cells.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: The patients called it T-2. Some of them called it Tea-For-Two.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: Easier, Poly thought, than to go on day after day calling it by its real name. Cancer.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: Through the thin, jaundiced skin next to Helen's hip she could see the whorls and indentations of the fist-sized tumor.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: In a matter of days, a week or two at most, it would poison her liver or perforate her intestines and she would die.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: One of the doctors pulled the gown back over the swelling and smiled. "Sorry," she said, and Poly smiled back at her mechanically.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: The doctors left and Poly wondered how they could stand it, the sight of muscles tight with pain, the stink of stale farts and antibiotics, the sound of men crying hopelessly in the dark.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: "How are you feeling?" she asked Helen. "Super," Helen said. "Hundred and two percent."
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: Poly moved her feet uncomfortably. She couldn't find any humor in the disease, black or otherwise, and attempts at it struck her as tasteless and cruel.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: She remembered a vistor in the cafeteria wearing a T-shirt that said, "Cancers Need Love Too." Under the words was a drawing of the hideous, mutated heart they'd taken out of one woman's belly.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: "Really," she said. "Okay. No pain. How's work?"
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: "Another Vogue shoot. The new Versace stuff. It's nice." Helen nodded and closed her eyes.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: Her blonde hair looked gray and shadows made long vertical lines down her face. On the right side of her forehead was a smudge of yellows and browns.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: "Your head..." "Nothing," Helen said, her fingers hovering over the bruise, not quite touching it.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: Poly thought of the robots, on their way back to the warehouse now, their harsh clean lines that would never bruise, never age, never bulge with cancer.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: "What happened?" "I was ... sleepwalking."
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: "Sleepwalking?" "It happens. With the disease. With ... this kind of tumor."
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: For the first time Poly noticed the straps hanging limply from the side of the bed. "Helen, I..." "Don't."
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: The silence began to sound like it could go on forever. "You're tired," Poly said at last.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: "Yes." "I'll go." "Thank you ... for coming."
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: Poly squeezed her hand. It was cold, withered, freckled with liver spots.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: I'm no help, Poly thought. She doesn't even want me here.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: Because she has the disease and I don't and so we can't even talk to each other any more.
scene_description: indoors, hospital room, medical bed, sunlight, clinical equipment.

segment_text: On TV the robots were dancing. Poly left the channel on and walked through the apartment, moving the furniture from where it had been pushed against the walls, shutting the cameras and computer consoles back in their closets.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: Everything tucked away, back to stark white walls and hardwood floors and cold, antiseptic air. Safe, she thought.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: Back in control. She put something in the microwave and watched the TV, telling herself she was doing research, knowing the motion of the gleaming bodies was beginning to hypnotize her, the meaning dancing just beyond her reach.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: When the phone rang she answered it without looking away from the screen. "It's Sy."
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: "And?" "I'm at the warehouse. You better get over here."
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: "Why? What's wrong?" "You better see it."
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: Spin. Bow.
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: One knee collapsing, then coming back up. One arm out, the other shoulder dropping.
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: Shuffle. Turn. No rhythm.
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: No synchronization. No pattern. But something there just the same, like the barely discernable humanity of twelve tone music.
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: "Christ," Poly said. "I just got the last one in. And they started."
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: "They can't be doing it themselves," she said. "Can they?" Sy shook his head.
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: "Then who is? Who's running them?" "I already swept the place. Not transmissions. Not in or out."
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: "Then what's making them do it?" The thrust of a glistening metal hip seemed sexual, threatening.
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: She wanted to look away but couldn't. I was wrong to mimic this, she thought.
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: Alien, yes, sinister, yes, but pure somehow. This dance belongs to whoever is running it.
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: Whoever it is. "Don't know," Sy said. "Probably nobody does."
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: "What about the others? The ones on cable. Some of those are taped around here, aren't they?"
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: "Yeah, some." "Where?"
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: "Clubs. Places downtown. The Licks, I think. Some others." She started for the door.
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: "Hey. What if they don't know either?" "Somebody knows," she said.
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: Somebody could explain, find a compartment to put them in, a word for what she was feeling that would give her a handle on it. "What about ... them?" Sy asked.
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: A smooth, steel oval of a face seemed to be staring at her. The head tilted slightly, quizzically, and then the body underneath it spun it away.
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: "Leave them," she said.
scene_description: indoors, large warehouse space, concrete floor, stacked crates, dim lighting.

segment_text: The downtown sidewalks seethed with life. Neon reflected from mirrored glasses and spattered the dirty white robes of the shaykers.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime city street, neon signs, crowded sidewalk, club entrance.

segment_text: Just to get from the cab to the front door of the club she had to push her way through what seemed to be a hundred of them, her padded jacket protecting her from their jutting elbows and shoulders.
scene_description: outdoors, nighttime city street, neon signs, crowded sidewalk, club entrance.

segment_text: The inside of the Licks was dark and crowded as the street, but the smoke and beer fumes and the residual amyl nitrate tang added grit to the air.
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: On stage five robots danced, one of them stenciled with a radiation hazard symbol. Huge speakers battered the audience with computer generated twelve-tone.
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: Poly's stomach crawled and her eyes burned. She looked for somebody in control.
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: Both bartenders were in full Noh makeup, their faces slack and impassive. The only other employee in sight was a scrawny boy in a sleeveless T-shirt, running lights and tapes from the top of a padded booth.
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: She had to cross the dance floor to get to him. The small open area was packed with spaced-out shaykers and sullen straights, their feet planted and their bodies swaying to some soundless communal rhythm.
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: She reached up and rapped on the window of the booth. The scrawny kid stared down at her, the black speaker grid taking the place of his mouth.
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: "Can I talk to you?" she shouted. The eyes stared at her without expression, then disappeared.
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: A door opened in the side of the booth and she squeezed through. The space inside was no bigger than the toilet on a plane.
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: The kid sat on a ladder that led up to his controls, his knees on a level with Poly's face. "The robots," she said. "Who runs them?"
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: The kid's lips moved, but she couldn't hear him over the noise. "What?" she shouted.
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: "Nobody," he repeated. "No transmitter. Nothing. Cops looked. Two, three times. Nothing."
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: "Where do they come from? How do they get here?" "Walk. Different ones, all the time."
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: "Why here?" The kid shrugged. "You from the cable?"
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: "No," she said. "Want some snort?"
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: "No," she said. "Thanks." She pushed her way out of the booth.
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: From where she stood she could see the glazed eyes and parted lips of the mob, swaying back and forth.
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: Like some crackpot religious cult, she thought, watching their prophets. Or maybe like they were just walking in their sleep.
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: Sleepwalking. She saw where her thoughts were going and her hands and feet went cold.
scene_description: indoors, dark crowded club, stage with lights, bar area, smoky air.

segment_text: The front doors of the hospital were locked, so she went in through Emergency.
scene_description: indoors, hospital elevator, sterile corridors, fluorescent lighting.

segment_text: Nobody tried to stop her.
scene_description: indoors, hospital elevator, sterile corridors, fluorescent lighting.

segment_text: Helen's room was dark. Poly left the door open to get a trickle of light from the hall and quietly moved a chair to the side of the bed.
scene_description: indoors, dark hospital room, medical bed, faint hallway light, shadows.

segment_text: Helen was asleep, her fingertips twitching in tiny convulsions on top of the straps that held her down. Even through the sheet and the hospital gown Poly could see the bulge of the tumor.
scene_description: indoors, dark hospital room, medical bed, faint hallway light, shadows.

segment_text: She took the paperweight out of her jacket pocket. In the darkness of the room the foil sails were motionless.
scene_description: indoors, dark hospital room, medical bed, faint hallway light, shadows.

segment_text: Poly sat and waited, hardly breathing, holding the paperweight directly over the cancer. New toy, she thought.
scene_description: indoors, dark hospital room, medical bed, faint hallway light, shadows.

segment_text: Come on. Reach out, play with it. I dare you.
scene_description: indoors, dark hospital room, medical bed, faint hallway light, shadows.

segment_text: Her eyes hurt from staring. She blinked twice, quickly.
scene_description: indoors, dark hospital room, medical bed, faint hallway light, shadows.

segment_text: Or better yet, she thought, just prove me wrong. I'll feel like an idiot, but at least I'll get some sleep tonight.
scene_description: indoors, dark hospital room, medical bed, faint hallway light, shadows.

segment_text: Slowly the sails began to move. Poly looked away and then back again.
scene_description: indoors, dark hospital room, medical bed, faint hallway light, shadows.

segment_text: The sails spun, faster and faster. The dome began to vibrate in Poly's hands.
scene_description: indoors, dark hospital room, medical bed, faint hallway light, shadows.

segment_text: Her teeth sank into her lower lip and she tasted blood. The sails were a gray blur inside the dome.
scene_description: indoors, dark hospital room, medical bed, faint hallway light, shadows.

segment_text: And then Helen's head came up, eyes open, one clawed hand jerking free from the strap and reaching for the paperweight.
scene_description: indoors, dark hospital room, medical bed, faint hallway light, shadows.

segment_text: The eyes were not Helen's any more. Something blind, deaf, and horribly alien was trying to see out through them.
scene_description: indoors, dark hospital room, medical bed, faint hallway light, shadows.

segment_text: Poly's mouth opened to scream and nothing came out. The hand snatched the paperweight away and Poly watched the fingers tighten until it imploded with a sharp crack and tiny bits of glass spewed over the room.
scene_description: indoors, dark hospital room, medical bed, faint hallway light, shadows.

segment_text: She flinched from the sound and it was enough to break the contact with those awful eyes. She lurched sideways out of her chair and went onto her hands and knees in the broken glass.
scene_description: indoors, dark hospital room, medical bed, faint hallway light, shadows.

segment_text: And then she ran.
scene_description: indoors, dark hospital room, medical bed, faint hallway light, shadows.

segment_text: She sat on her couch, a drink untouched on the table beside her. The blood from the cuts on her hands had dried.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: She sat and tuned through the channels on the cable, one after another. I could never prove it, she thought.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: But I know it's true. She thought about all the patients in all the hospitals, about the cancerous brains that grew inside them, minds without eyes, without mouths, without arms or legs or vocal cords.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: Minds reaching without hands for bodies they could control, chrome steel bodies that would live far beyond their few weeks of feeble awareness. Bodies that would live forever.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.

segment_text: She dropped the remote control and her hands clenched until the knuckles went yellow with the strain. On the screen the robots danced.
scene_description: indoors, computer monitors, keyboards, minimalist furniture, hardwood floors.
